items.name: Pizza Decorating for Kids
items.description: In Chestnut Hill, on Monday nights beginning at 5 , Little Chefs celebrate the art of authentic pizza making using the freshest ingredients! Each child receives pizza dough, san marzano tomato sauce, cheese, pepperoni & their own Davio’s Apron! While the pizza is baking, kids get a mini pizza dough ball to play with! Pizza Kits are also available for pick up after 5 on Mondays! Orders must be placed by calling at least one hour in advance of pick up!

items.name: per child†
items.description: Reserve Now

items.name: Notes:
items.description: Pizza Kits are available in our Chestnut Hill location to create in the restaurant or for pick up after 5 on Mondays! Pick up orders must be placed by calling at least one hour in advance of pick up! Before placing your order, please inform your server if a person in your party has a food allergy. Please note that not all ingredients are listed. While every effort is made to remove all bones, please use caution when consuming fish dishes. Tax, gratuity, and other beverages not included. A 20% gratuity is added to parties of 6 or more. We offer a selection of homemade breads, desserts, ice creams, and sorbets from our own bakery. We purify our water, ice and coffee with Premium Aqua Health Filter System

items.description: Tuna, salmon, sweet potato tempura, tobikko, cucumber, and spicy creamy sauce. Secret Garden Maki Salmon tempura and cream cheese center with avocado, spinach, tobikko, pickle, mixed baby greens and mango, wrapped with daikon. Served with sweet plum chili sauce. Cherry Blossom Salmon, avocado, and tempura crumbs topped with tuna. Ladybug Maki Shrimp, crab stick, and octopus, topped with tomato, black tobiko, and spicy mayo. Norris Roll Salmon, avocado, tobikko with soybean skin, and wasabi mayo sauce. Princess Maki Shrimp tempura with tuna and avocado. Yokohama Maki Salmon, tuna, cucumber, crunch, tobiko with wasabi sauce, and spicy kabayaki sauce. Wasabi Maki Tuna, salmon, avocado, red tobikko, and wasabi tobikko. Sunset Maki Spicy seafood topped with torched salmon and spicy creamy sauce finished with kabayaki sauce. Autumn Maki Shrimp tempura topped with torched white fish and mango finished with spicy teriyaki sauce. Godzilla Maki Asparagus, mushroom tempura, avocado, and spicy creamy sauce. Spicy Kaki Katsu Maki Deep-fried oysters, cucumber, and scallion. Obachama Maki Spicy seafood topped with spicy salmon and yuzu tobikko. White Caterpillar Maki Cucumber and spicy mayo, topped with live scallops and tobikko. Green Dragon Spicy yellowtail and tempura crumbs topped with avocado. Tri - Color Maki Asparagus, tobikko, and avocado, topped with salmon and wasabi tobikko

items.description: Sweet potato tempura and cucumber, topped with mango. Double Taste Maki Tuna, topped with tuna, salmon, inure, and scallion. Traffic Light Maki Tuna, salmon, avocado, radish, and tobiko. Queen of Fish Maki Asparagus and avocado, topped with mango and salmon. Black Forest Unagi, sweet potato tempura, and avocado, topped with kabayaki sauce and black tobiko

items.name: Classic Burrito
items.description: Our most complete burrito. Comes with your protein choice (Al Pastor Chicken, Al Pastor/Pork, Birria Beef, Steak, Carnitas or Grilled Chicken), rice (choice of white rice and pinto beans or black Rice), lettuce, pico, guac and Sour cream on a 12 inch tortilla.

items.name: Veggie Burrito
items.description: Comes with your veggie filling choice, rice (choice of white rice and pinto beans or black Rice), lettuce, pico, guac and Sour cream on a 12 inch tortilla.

items.name: Spicy Grilled Fish Burrito
items.description: Comes with spicy grilled fish, rice (choice of white rice and pinto beans or black Rice), lettuce, pico, guac and Sour cream on a 12 inch tortilla.

items.name: Shrimp Burrito
items.description: Comes with shrimp, rice (choice of white rice and pinto beans or black Rice), lettuce, pico, guac and Sour cream on a 12 inch tortilla.

items.name: Classic Quesadilla
items.description: Delicious Street Style Quesadilla with your choice of protein (Grilled Chicken, Chicken Al Pastor, Al Pastor Pork, Pork (Carnitas), Birria Beef or Steak), over a grilled 8 inch tortilla with cheese. Comes with a 2oz side of fresh pico de gallo. Super hungry? Double up you will love it.

items.name: Veggie Quesadilla
items.description: Delicious Street Style Quesadilla with grilled mushroom, green and red pepper, onions and corn over a grilled 8 inch tortilla with cheese. Comes with a 2oz side of fresh pico de gallo.

items.name: Grilled Shrimp Quesadilla
items.description: Delicious Street Style Quesadilla with marinated and charred shrimp, in a grilled 8 inch tortilla with cheese. Comes with a 2oz side of fresh pico de gallo.

items.name: Al Pastor Street Taco
items.description: Marinated pork, pineapple chunks, diced onions, cilantro, and green salsa on soft corn tortillas, garnished with lime wedges and sliced jalapeños.

items.name: Steak Street Taco
items.description: Delicious marinated steak. top with onions and cilantro and optional avo cream. note: avo cream is optinal.

items.name: Grilled Shrimp Street Tacos
items.description: Tender grilled shrimp topped with fresh cilantro, diced onions, and creamy avocado sauce, served on a soft corn tortilla with a wedge of lime.

items.name: Pork Street Taco (Carnitas)
items.description: Tender pork carnitas topped with diced pineapple, onions, and cilantro, served with lime wedges and side sauces.

items.name: Chicken Al Pastor Street Taco
items.description: Marinated chicken topped with diced pineapple, onions, cilantro, and a blend of red and green salsas on a soft tortilla.

items.name: Ground Beef
items.description: Delicious ground tacos. top with onions and cilantro and optional avo cream. note: avo cream is optional.

items.name: Birria Tacos - 2 Per Order
items.description: Mouthwatering birria beef with Cheese, cilantro and onions. On perfectly grilled tortillas. 2 per order.

items.name: Chimichurri Steak Tacos - 2 Per Order
items.description: The perfect combination Steak and Chimichurri Sauce + Fried Yellow Plantains. Topped with Avo Cream, Hot Sauce, Red Cabbage and Fresh Cheese.

items.name: Classic Bowl
items.description: Rice white and Pinto Beans or Black rice, Lettuce, Pico, Choice of Protein (Pork, Chicken Al Pastor, Steak, Grilled Chicken, Spicy Grilled Chicken) and Avo Cream

items.name: Dominican Bowl
items.description: White Rice & Pinto Beans or Black Rice, Dominican Stew Chicken, Lettuce & Maduros (Fried Sweet Plantains)

items.name: Cuban Bowl
items.description: Delicious Ropa Vieja (Shredded Beef) on Black rice (Congri). Salad and fried yellow platains.

items.name: Jerk Chicken Bowl - Spicy
items.description: White Rice & Pinto Beans or Black Rice, Jamaican Style Jerk Chicken, Pineapple - Red Cabbage Salad & Maduros (Fried Sweet Plantains) and Avo Cream.

items.name: Grilled Shrimp Bowl
items.description: Rice white and Pinto Beans or Black rice, Lettuce, Pico, Choice of Protein and Avo Cream.

items.description: Choice Protein (Chicken Al Pastor, Steak Fajita, Birria Beef, Pork Al Pastor, Grilled Chicken, Pork)over a fajita mix. White rice and Pinto Beans or Black Rice, Pico & Lettuce, plus two 8 inch flour tortillas.

items.name: Fish Fajita Bowl
items.description: Choice Protein (Spicy Grilled Fish or Regular Shrimp) over a fajita mix. White rice and Pinto Beans or Black Rice, Pico & Lettuce, plus two 8 inch flour tortillas.

items.description: Fajita Veggie mix. White rice and Pinto Beans or Black Rice, Pico & Lettuce, plus two 8 inch flour tortillas.

items.name: We serve identity, history, and flavor passed down through generations
items.description: TACOS EL CHIKIS was born from a passion to share the true taste of México—a fusion of family recipes, street-side inspiration, and the bold spirit of ancestral culinary traditions. A reflection of aromas of simmering salsas, the laughter of family gatherings, and the rhythm of everyday life in the mercados. Today, we honor that heritage by crafting every dish with authentic ingredients, traditional techniques, and a deep respect for regional flavors. Our goal is to welcome you to a space where food brings people together, where every corner reflects tradition, and where everyone is welcome

items.name: Enjoy all of our offerings without leaving your home.

items.description: Roasted acorn squash, marinated charred kale, caramelized red onions, and mint sauteed with jasmine rice and Aleppo chili oil, topped with roasted salmon. (950 cal, Contains: Fish) Maple, Squash & Chicken Salad Mixed baby lettuce, baby kale, roasted acorn squash, carrots, and roasted chicken breast topped with toasted almonds and dried cranberries served with maple labneh dressing. Potato, Mushroom, & Bacon Shakshuka Petit Linzer Heart Assortment Warm Oatmeal & Fruit Warm oatmeal topped with fresh blueberries, orange blossom honey-soaked dried apricots and golden raisins, black sesame, sunflower and pumpkin seeds with a ginger date syrup. (Contains: Sesame) Iced Black Sesame Latte - 16 oz Housemade Black Sesame Syrup topped with espresso and steamed milk and ice. (360 cal, Contains: Milk, Sesame) Black Sesame Latte - 12 oz Housemade Black Sesame Syrup topped with espresso and steamed milk. (400 cal, Contains: Milk, Sesame) Orange Upside Down Cake Slice Tender vanilla-orange cake topped with candied cara cara oranges and almond streusel. Heart Coffee Caramel Mousse (GF) Our rich and creamy coffee caramel mousse in an elegant heart shape, set on a chocolate sable and finished with a velvety chocolate spray. (470 cal. Contains: Egg, Milk) Apple Turnover Flaky puff pastry filled with caramelized spiced apples. Royal Icing Heart Cookie Our signature butter cookies, cut into hearts and topped with royal icing and sanding sugar. (160 cal, Contains: Egg, Milk, Wheat) Honey Carrot Cake Slice Honey carrot cake spiced with Ras el Hanout (a North African warm spice blend) topped with a cream cheese frosting. (710 cal, Contains: Egg, Wheat, Milk) Petit Cloud Assortment (GF) Monkey Bread Croissant dough with cinnamon spiced sugar and brown sugar caramel. (480 cal, Contains: Wheat, Milk, Egg) Linzer Heart Cookie Our signature butter cookies, shaped as hearts and filled with housemade jam, dusted with powdered sugar. (280 cal, Contains: Egg, Milk, Wheat)

items.description: Wellesley Farms How much advance notice is required? We require 24 hours notice for catering orders. Can you accommodate dietary restrictions (gluten-free, vegan, allergies)? Yes, we will make our best attempt to accommodate any dietary restrictions. Please call us directly for specific requests. Do you require a minimum order amount? No, there is no minimum order amount to place a catering order. There may be a minimum order amount to have your order delivered. Do you provide plates, napkins, and cutlery? Please call us directly for any specific utensil requests

categories.name: SeasonalOur beer changes with the seasons. Enjoy one of these brews before they’re gone.

items.name: Voodoo Ranger Blaze Lightning IPA IPA - New England / Hazy
items.description: Flashing a tropical storm of flavor, this IPA punches above its weight class. Behold the Hammer of Haze. 6oz $4.25 14oz $8.50 20oz $11.50

items.name: 6oz
items.description: Flashing a tropical storm of flavor, this IPA punches above its weight class. Behold the Hammer of Haze.

items.name: Cold Snap Wheat Beer - Witbier / Blanche
items.description: A White Ale brewed with a blend of fresh ground spring spices including orange, plum, and fresh ground coriander. 6oz $4.25 14oz $8.50 20oz $11.50

items.name: Scarlet Red Ale - Other
items.description: English-style red ale 6oz $4.25 14oz $8.50 20oz $11.50

items.name: Black Lager (Černé Pivo) Lager - Tmavé (Czech Dark)
items.description: Inspired by the black session lagers of the Czech Republic, Notch Black Lager (Cerne Pivo) is malty, toasty, and infinitely drinkable. Notch breaks the myth the dark beer is heavy, or that lower alcohol beer is light in color. Cerne Pivo is Czech for "Black Beer", and is a beer style indigenous to the Czech Republic. This style of beer is rarely found in the US, so enjoy a bit of the Czech session beer culture this winter. 6oz $4.00 14oz $8.00 20oz $11.00

items.name: Fluffy IPA - New England / Hazy
items.description: Our flagship hazy IPA, Fluffy sips like a fresh squeeze of hoppy orange juice. It features all cryo hops in the recipe, 95% added post-boil for an extra drinkable, minimally bitter profile. Heavy dry-hopping adds layer upon layer of citrus saturation. Every sip is juicy and bright, bursting with enormous flavors of sweet clementine, fresh apricot, and ripe mango. 6oz $4.00 14oz $8.00 20oz $11.00

items.name: Wild Herd Kölsch
items.description: We wanted to offer an easy-drinking beer that our guests can enjoy with their wings and burgers during a marathon of games in our sports bars. A Kölsch is the perfect hybrid beer, giving the easy drinkability of a lager with the flavor profile of a craft ale. While the ale yeast gives the light, citrus notes you’d expect from a craft beer, Goose Island lagers the beer, giving it the smooth and refreshing finish you would expect from a light lager. 6oz $3.75 14oz $7.50 20oz $10.50

items.name: Boston Lager Lager - American
items.description: Samuel Adam’s Boston Lager is approachable, complex, and smooth with the perfect balance of caramel malt sweetness and spicy hop bitterness. First brewed in 1984 in our founder Jim Koch’s kitchen at a time when there were under 100 breweries in the United States, Samuel Adams Boston Lager helped pave the way for the American craft beer revolution. 6oz $4.25 14oz $8.50 20oz $11.50

items.name: Nitro Stout Stout - Irish Dry
items.description: This taproom favorite uses Irish malts to deliver notes of chocolate and roast that are elevated by a dose of nitrogen added during canning 6oz $4.25 14oz $8.50 20oz $11.50

items.name: Rise Pale Ale - American
items.description: A bright citrus aroma leads to a pleasantly smooth body with a subtle hop spice finish. 6oz $4.25 14oz $8.50 20oz $11.50

items.name: Sip of Sunshine IPA - Imperial / Double
items.description: This lupulin-ladin India Pale Ale is packed with juicy tropical fruit character, bright floral aromas and delectable layers of hop flavor. Pour mindfully, inhale deeply and enjoy a tropical vacation in a glass. Always store cold, enjoy fresh and stay cool! 6oz $5.00 14oz $10.00 20oz $13.00

items.name: Porter Porter - English
items.description: Taking its cues from “Three Threads”, a bartender’s blend of three distinct ales, Porter became the beer of choice for 18th-century Londoners. Mayflower Porter embraces this history. This complex brew is smooth and full-flavored with notes of roasted coffee beans and bittersweet chocolate that will warm the palate all year long. 6oz $4.00 14oz $8.00 20oz $11.00

items.name: Gunner's Daughter Stout - Milk / Sweet
items.description: A beautifully aromatic and balanced milk stout with delicious notes of peanut butter, coffee, and dark chocolate. This dark, mythical beer nods to the long-passed legends of our region’s seafarers. - Contains lactose. Does not contain nuts or peanuts. 6oz $4.25 14oz $8.50 20oz $11.50

items.name: The Substance IPA - New England / Hazy
items.description: Our precious flagship. Brewed with a plethora of Pacific Northwest varieties both new and time-tested. Dank, citrus-forward, and herbaceous, Substance's flavor profile is just mysterious enough. Proudly brewed with 100% Maine-grown grain. 6oz $4.75 14oz $9.50 20oz $12.50

items.name: Fiddlehead IPA IPA - American
items.description: Our flagship IPA, A hop forward American IPA with mellow bitterness. Citrusy and Dank. Well Balanced. 6oz $4.25 14oz $8.50 20oz $11.50

items.name: Polyamorous Cabal Farmhouse Ale - Saison
items.description: This complex, subtle and elegant saison is a veritable orgy of flavor. A truly ferment-driven beer with a rich blend of fruity esters and spicy phenols, you’d be forgiven for wanting more than one. In fact, you’d be surprised to learn how many people aren’t satisfied with only just one. 6oz $4.00 14oz $8.00 20oz $11.00

items.name: Crispy Business Kölsch
items.description: Crispy Business is a crisp, smooth, and dry Kölsch-style ale that pours straw gold in color. Its bready malt profile is well-balanced by traditional German hops that provide mild bittering and a delicate and pleasant aroma of apple and pear. At 4.5% ABV, it's extremely clean and drinkable. 6oz $4.00 14oz $8.00 20oz $11.00

items.name: Shark Tracker Lager - American Light

In 1989 it won a silver medal in its category (American Brown Ale) at the Great American Beer Festival in Denver. 6oz $4.25 14oz $8.50 20oz $11.50

Or meal. 6oz $4.25 14oz $8.50 20oz $11.50

California's spoiling, warm weather encourages outdoor activity year round - and now the rest of the nation can join in. From surfing our coasts, to snowboarding and biking in the mountains, off-roading through deserted lands, or boating and fishing in our lakes, Stone Buenaveza Salt & Lime Lager is an excellent companion. items.name: Guinness Draught 0.0 Non-Alcoholic - Porter / Stout
items.description: To create Guinness 0.0, the St James’s Gate brewers start by brewing Guinness exactly as they always have, using the same natural ingredients; water, barley, hops and yeast; before gently removing the alcohol through a cold filtration method. The cold filtration process allows the alcohol to be filtered out without presenting thermal stress to the beer, protecting the integrity of its taste and character. The brewers then carefully blend and balance the flavours to ensure the distinctive flavour profile and taste characteristics of Guinness. The resulting product is a stout that is unmistakably Guinness, just without the alcohol, featuring the same dark, ruby red liquid and creamy head, hints of chocolate and coffee. 16oz Can $7.50

You may authorize another individual or a business, called an authorized agent, to make requests on your behalf through these means. Please note that your right to opt out does not apply to our sharing of personal information with Service Providers, as described above. Right to Opt Out of Automated Decision making Right to Information Regarding Participation in Data Sharing for Financial Incentives If you would like to withdraw your consent to participate in a Program, you may do so at any time by visiting https://www.jerseymikes.com/account and requesting to delete your account. Deleting your account will terminate your participation in the Program. Visit the terms and conditions page of each Program to view full details. Right to Request Further Review If we deny your request, you may have the right to appeal our decision. You can request further review by emailing privacy@jerseymikes.com

items.description: November 24, 2025 Reward Program No Comments New Rewards Perks & Member-Only Specials Available at purchases made at ALL STORES when you join the Meet Fresh Rewards Program These items are only available at Arcadia, CA , Cerritos, CA , Cupertino, CA , Fremont, CA , Hacienda Heights, CA , Irvine, CA , Santa Clara, CA , Temple City, CA, and other select locations Our latest release features: – Fluffy Hot Chocolate Slush — A festive blend of chocolate and cool mint, topped with fluffy green whipped cream and holiday sprinkles. – Pineapple Green Tea with Biscoff Fluffy — Inspired by classic pineapple cake, this drink combines smooth pineapple green tea with real fruit bits and a creamy Biscoff fluffy on top. – Hot Cocoa — Warm, creamy, and caffeine-free, this cozy drink is ideal for kids or anyone wanting something nostalgic. -Creme Brulee Thai Tea — A luxurious mix of rich Thai tea and a hand-torched brulee topping that melts beautifully into every sip. Read more about all of our December promotions here A Rewards Program That Gives Back All Year Long

items.description: Below is our current seasonal menu! All our ice cream is made in small batches, so they rotate frequently and sometimes we run out. If you have your heart set on a flavor, don't hesitate to give us a call to see if we have it in our cabinet!

items.name: Classic
items.description: Birthday Cake Vanilla ice cream swirled with chocolate marshmallow buttercream, chocolate cake truffles, and homemade rainbow sprinkles. contains: milk, egg, wheat, soy Brown Sugar Vanilla Vanilla ice cream sweetened with brown sugar. contains: milk, egg Cold Brew Coffee Chip Coffee ice cream studded with flecks of dark chocolate. contains: milk, egg, soy Honey Lavender Lavender ice cream infused with lavender from Curio Spice and sweetened with local honey from New England Beekeeping. contains: milk, egg Milk Chocolate Stracciatella Milk chocolate ice cream studded with flecks of dark chocolate. contains: milk, egg, soy Peanut Butter Fudge Crunch Peanut butter ice cream layered with homemade hot fudge and chocolate cookie crunchies. contains: milk, egg, peanuts, soy, tree nuts (coconut), wheat Salted Caramel Crackle Salted caramel ice cream folded with homemade honeycomb candy. contains: milk, egg Frozen Yogurt

items.name: Lemon
items.description: Greek frozen yogurt infused with fresh lemon juice and zest. contains: milk Raspberry Vanilla Raspberry frozen yogurt infused with vanilla extract. contains: milk

items.name: Seasonal
items.description: Banana Bread & Fudge Roasted banana ice cream layered with swirls of hot fudge and homemade banana bread. contains: milk, egg, wheat, soy Blonde Chocolate Cheesecake Caramelized white chocolate ice cream layered with ribbons of cream cheese buttercream and homemade graham cracker crust crumble. contains: milk, egg, wheat, soy Cherry Ruby Chocolate Ruby chocolate ice cream spun with roasted sweet cherries. contains: milk, egg, soy Dark Chocolate & Raspberry Dark chocolate ice cream with swirls of homemade raspberry jam. contains: milk, egg, soy Plum Pistachio Crumble Ice cream spiced with Fork on a Road’s Shahi Gulshan, layered with plum jam and homemade pistachio crumble. contains: milk, egg, sesame, tree nuts (pistachio), wheat Strawberry Rose Gâteau Roasted strawberry ice cream lightly infused with rosewater and studded with homeemade, buttercream-filled sponge cake. contains: milk, egg, wheat

items.name: Vegan
items.description: Chocolate Covered Strawberry Roasted strawberry ice cream (made with coconut cream and oat milk) swirled with ribbons of vegan hot fudge. contains: tree nuts (coconut) Chocolate Sorbet Intensely dark chocolate sorbet made with 100% cocoa mass.
